div.p: Coffee house located in Vienna's first district at Kärntner Ring 16, within the Hotel Imperial.

In September 1910, Schenker was invited there to meet with members of the Vereinigung Wiener Referenten to discuss s planned lecture series on Beethoven's Ninth Symphony. On May 26, 1924 the important meeting with Emil Hertzka and Robert Winter of UE, with Jeanette and Schenker's brother Moriz in attendance, took place at which the conversion of Der Tonwille to a quarterly publication was discussed. In September of that year he and Jeanette went there for coffee, and he commented on the "state of final decay with new marble furnishings".
